channel.title: 317 Theiveing
channel.description: I want to change the amount of coins and XP it gives on each diffrent stall how would I go about this?

item.title: 317 Theiveing
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Mod Brandon12111, post:8, topic:349019”][quote author=Epic Steve link=topic=445393.msg3270257#msg3270257 date=1279147640]
Look how the method is declared,

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {

Then look how the method would be called.

TheifStall("Some Name", "You steal some shit", 10, 150, 995, 100, 353);

Look at the parameters respectively to how they are declared.
[/quote]

THANK YOU Epic Steve! YOU ARE TRULY EPIC[/quote]

[quote=“usman555, post:9, topic:349019”][quote author=Epic Steve link=topic=445393.msg3270257#msg3270257 date=1279147640]
Look how the method is declared,

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {

Then look how the method would be called.

TheifStall("Some Name", "You steal some shit", 10, 150, 995, 100, 353);

Look at the parameters respectively to how they are declared.
[/quote]
that actually thought me something, ty :)[/quote]

Not a problem, glad I managed to help.

item.title: 317 Theiveing
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

I know it’s been asked alot but see, here’s the thing I can’t find it like that Here’s my theive code, maybe you can help me find it.

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
 if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
   actionInterval = 4000;
   lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
   setAnimation(emote);
   sM("You take from the stall..");
   sM(message);
   addItem(item, itemAmount);
   addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
  }
  else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
  sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall.");
 }
}

Read full topic

item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Mod Brandon12111:

I want to change the amount of coins and XP it gives on each diffrent stall how would I go about this?

How many times has this been asked?
Anyways, client class. Look for the current amount of money one of your stalls gives and change it. Same for the XP, also in the code.
